text: QQ privacy protection guidelines
Update date: [2021] Year [11] month [1] Day
label: Policy Change

text: Effective date: [2021] Year [11] month [1] Day
label: Policy Change

text: QQ is a social product provided by Shenzhen Tencent Computer System Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as "We" or "Tencent").Essence
label: Contact Information

text: During the product operation process, it will also jointly operate with affiliated companies, such as channel cooperation and brand linkage.

We will help you understand how QQ will collect, use and store your personal information and what rights you enjoy through the "Guidelines for the Privacy Property Protection" (hereinafter referred to as "this guideline").
The points are as follows:

i. We will explain the types of personal information we collected one by one and its corresponding processing methods in order to understand the types, processing purposes and collection methods of specific personal information collected for a specific function.

II. When you use some functions, we will collect some of your sensitive information after obtaining your consent. For example, when you use the QQ motion function, we will collect your step information.We will collect your mobile phone contact information, and when you use nearby functions, we will collect your geographical information.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: Unless it is collected in accordance with the requirements of relevant laws and regulations, refusing to provide this information will only make you unable to use relevant features, but it does not affect other functions of your use of QQ normally.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: III. Our third -party partners will collect and use your personal information with third -party SDK.
label: Usage
Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
First Party Collection Information

text: For the specific situation of third -party information sharing, please refer to the "List of QQ and Third -Party Sharing Information" (including "Third -Party SDK Catalog").
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure

text: In addition, QQ will not actively share or transfer your personal information to a third party outside Tencent.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure

text: When there are other shared or transferred your personal information or you need us to share or transfer your personal information to a third party situation outside Tencent, we will directly or confirm that third parties obtain your separate consent of the above behavior.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure

text: In addition, we will evaluate the risk of providing information to the outside world.
label: Data Security

text: IV. At present, in addition to obtaining related log information for logging in to the third -party APP with QQ account, QQ will not take the initiative to obtain your personal information from a third party outside Tencent.

If the business development needs to indirectly obtain your personal information from other third parties, we will explicitly show you the source, type, and scope of use of your personal information before acquisition.The scope of authorization consent when providing personal information to third parties, we will obtain your separate consent before processing your personal information;
label: First Party Collection Information

text: In addition, we will also strictly abide by the provisions of relevant laws and regulations, and require a third party to ensure the legality of the information provided.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: v. You can query, correct, delete your personal information listed by this guideline, or withdraw your consent, cancel your account, and set privacy functions.
label: Edit/Control

text: vi. In order to collect your information under this guideline, or to provide you with services, optimize our services, and ensure your account security, we will need to obtain relevant permissions from you;
label: Permission Acquisition

text: The sensitivity permissions (such as address book, accurate geographical location, camera, microphone, album, etc.) will not be opened by default. Only after you agree with your own consent alone, you are deemed to be authorized.
label: Permission Acquisition

text: Our obtaining a specific sensitive permissions does not mean that we will inevitably collect your relevant information;
label: Permission Acquisition

text: Even if we have obtained sensitive permissions, we only collect and use your relevant information based on this guideline when necessary.
label: Permission Acquisition

text: If you want to know more detailed information, read the corresponding chapter according to the following index:
1. The information we collect
2. Storage of information
3. Information security
4. How do we use information
5. Provide outside
6. Your rights
7. Change
8. Minor protection
9. Others
10. Contact us
1. The information we collect

In the process of using QQ services, QQ will collect information you provide or due to the service when using the service as follows, to provide you with services, optimize our services, and ensure your account security:
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect the information that you take the initiative to provide or due to the service when using the service.

text: 1.1, when you register your QQ account, we will collect your nickname, avatar, and mobile phone number.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: When you register your QQ account, collect your nickname, avatar, and mobile phone number.

text: Collect this information to help you complete the QQ account registration to protect your account security.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Collect your nickname, avatar, and mobile phone number to help you complete your account registration to protect your account security.

text: The mobile phone number is a sensitive information. The collection of such information is to meet the relevant laws and regulations on the real -name system of the network.
label: Usage

text: If you do not provide such information, you may not be able to use our services normally.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you do not provide a mobile phone number, you may not be able to use the service normally.

text: You can also choose to fill in the signature, gender, birthday, education experience, occupation, company, location, hometown, mailbox, and personal description information according to your needs.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: You can choose to fill in the signature, gender, birthday, education experience, occupation, company, location, hometown, mailbox, and personal description information.

text: Device MAC address, unique device identifier (such as IMEI, Androididid, ICCID, IMSI), application list, login IP address, QQ software version number, access to network methods, types and status, network quality and data and other equipment information, operation logs, Service log information (such as information such as browsing history and service failure information under reading function) and other log information, this kind of information is the basic information that the service must be collected.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you use QQ services, collect your basic information, operating system information, network information, service log information, etc. to ensure the normal operation of the service and ensure account security.

text: In addition, we may collect your information through identifiers and related technologies to provide you with personalized user experience and guarantee service security.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect your information through identifiers and related technologies, thinking that you provide personalized user experience and guarantee service security.

text: 1.3, in order to handle your appeal, unlock freezing, etc. and/or increase account security, in accordance with the provisions of relevant laws and regulations and the requirements of the authority, we need to face your face to verify your identity.After getting your explicit consent, collect names, ID information, face image information, and face image information, and use the above information as an important basis for your authentication, so that you can use the QQ account to retrieve and relieve frozen account security related functions.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: After you explicitly agree to collect your name, identity document information, face image information for your identity verification in order to handle your appeal and unlock the freezing application.

text: 1.4, when you send messages (send pictures (including fast post), videos), shooting or editing pictures or videos, in order to provide you, we will visit your camera after obtaining your explicit consent, visit your camera, Album, Microphone, or your geographical location information (including GPS, nearby wifi, cellid, etc.) and/or the weather conditions of/or its corresponding geographical location are saved in the form of watermarks to your photos and editing photos.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you send messages, shooting or editing pictures or videos, you agree to access your camera, album, microphone, or save your geographical location information into your photos and edit photos.

text: The above information is a sensitive information, and refusal to provide this information does not affect other functions of your normal use of QQ.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 1.5, when you send messages with QQ, take pictures/videos, set up dynamic avatars, share positions, receive or save pictures/video/files, etc., we will visit your memory card after obtaining your explicit consent, visit your memory cardIt is convenient for you to provide you with relevant services better.
label: Permission Acquisition
Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: After you explicitly agree to access your memory card, it is thought that you provide functions such as sending messages, shooting or editing pictures.

text: The above information is a sensitive information, and refusal to provide this information does not affect other functions of your normal use of QQ.

First Party Collection Information
Usage

text: 1.7, when you use QQ voice input, voice and text conversion functions, we will collect your voice content because collecting is necessary to achieve the above functions.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect your voice content in order to provide QQ voice input, voice and text conversion functions.

text: After we deal with it in real time, we will return to you to deal with the results without saving your data.
label: Data Retention
Important

text: 1.8, when you use the function of adding friends, we will read the information of your mobile phone address book after obtaining your explicit consent.

text: The above information is a sensitive information. Rejecting to provide this information will only make you unable to use the above features, but it does not affect other functions of your normal use of QQ.

First Party Collection Information
Usage

Data Security

Important

text: This information is a sensitive information. Rejecting to provide this information will only make you unable to use the above features, but it does not affect other functions of your use of QQ normally.

label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you use the QQ motion function, you agree to obtain your geographical location information to record your movement trajectory.

text: In addition, we need to collect your step information as a voucher for your participation or compare with your friends.

First Party Collection Information
Usage

text: The above information is a sensitive information. Refusing to provide this information will only make you unable to use the QQ motion function, but it does not affect other functions of your normal use of QQ.

text: 1.10, when you use the QQ weather public account, drawer page, and online state weather function, we will collect your geographical location information (including precise geographical location information and rough geographical location information) after obtaining your explicit consent.Provide you with corresponding weather information and local news information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage

text: In the process of collecting your geographical location information, if the location information caused by the poor status of your network or device is inaccurate, we will use the location information of your cache to serve you.
label: Important
Usage

text: The accurate geographical information is a sensitive information, and refusal to provide this information does not affect other functions of your normal use of QQ.

label: Important
First Party Collection Information

text: 1.13, QQ wallet function will provide you with a service from Tenpay.

Important
rewrite: QQ wallet function is provided by Tenpay.

Important

1.14, when you use QQ wallets, QQ service numbers, QQ applets, QQ mini games and other functions, without your permission, QQ will not disclose to third -party merchants, QQ service number operators, developers, and disclose you to yourpersonal information.

Important

Important

First Party Collection Information

Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When you use QQ's collection or "Set Essence" function to store all kinds of information, these information will be uploaded and stored in the server.

text: Unless you choose or comply with relevant laws and regulations, we will not provide the above information or use it for other purposes other than this function.

Important
First Party Collection Information

text: This information is a sensitive information. Rejecting to provide this information will only make you unable to use the above features, but it does not affect other functions of your use of QQ normally.

label: Important
Risk

Important
rewrite: The third party scriptures you agree that you will obtain your personal information to us through the QQ interface.

text: The geographical information is a sensitive information. Rejecting to provide this information will only make you unable to use the above third -party services, but it does not affect your normal use of QQ.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
First Party Collection Information

text: In addition, according to relevant laws and regulations and national standards, in the following situations, we may collect or use your relevant personal information without soliciting your authorization consent:
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: According to relevant laws and regulations and national standards, in the following circumstances, we may collect and use your relevant personal information without asking your authorization consent:

text: 1) In order to establish and fulfill your personal contract as a party, or to implement human resource management in accordance with the labor rules and regulations and collective contracts signed in accordance with the law in accordance with the law;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: In order to establish and fulfill your personal contract as a party, or to implement the use information of human resource management in accordance with the labor rules and regulations formulated in accordance with the law and the collective contract signed in accordance with the law, no authorization consent is required.

text: 2) To fulfill the statutory duties or the requirements of the statutory volunteer;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: In order to fulfill the statutory duties or the collection and usage information necessary for the statutory volunteer, there is no need to solicit authorization consent.

text: 3) In order to deal with emergencies, or in urgent situations, it is necessary to protect the health and property safety of natural people;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: In order to cope with emergencies, or in urgent cases to protect the life and health of natural persons and the necessary collection and use information, no need to solicit authorization.

text: 4) In order to implement news reports and public opinion supervision, handle personal information within a reasonable scope;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: In order to implement news reports and public opinion supervision, deal with personal information within a reasonable scope without soliciting authorization consent.

text: 5) In accordance with the "Personal Information Protection Law of the People's Republic of China", deal with personal information that individuals are disclosed or other legally disclosed within a reasonable scope;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: In accordance with laws and regulations, personal information is processed by individuals or other legal disclosure within a reasonable range, and no authorization consent is required.

text: 6) Other circumstances stipulated in laws and administrative regulations.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Other collection and use information stipulated in laws and regulations does not need to solicit authorization.

text: Please understand that the functions and services we provide to you are constantly updated and developed. If a function or service is not in the aforementioned and collected your information, we will use page prompts, interactive processes, website announcements, etc.Explain the content, scope and purpose of information collection to you to obtain your consent.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If a function or service exceeds the scope of the instructions, we will explain to you the situation of information collection to obtain your consent.

text: Please note that in addition to obtaining related log information because you use the QQ account to log in to the third -party APP or service, the current QQ will not take the initiative to obtain your personal information from a third party outside Tencent.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: In addition to obtaining related log information because you use the QQ account to log in to a third -party app or service, QQ will not take the initiative to obtain your personal information from a third party outside Tencent.

text: If the business development needs to obtain your personal information from other third parties in the future, we will show you the source, type and processing rules of your personal information before acquisition, such as the personal information processing activity required for QQ to carry out business.The scope of authorization consent when third parties provide personal information. We will obtain your explicit consent before dealing with your personal information;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you need to obtain and process your personal information from a third party, we will ask the third party to obtain your consent and ensure the legitimacy of the information.

text: In addition, we will also strictly abide by the provisions of relevant laws and regulations, and require a third party to ensure the legality of the information provided.
label: Data Security

text: 2. Storage of information
2.1 Location of information storage
We will store personal information collected in China in China in accordance with laws and regulations.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: The personal information collected and generated in domestic operations will be stored in China.

text: At present, we will not transmit or store your personal information cross -border.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: At present, we will not transmit or store your personal information cross -border.

text: If you need to transmit or store cross -border in the future, we will inform you that the purpose of the information outbound, receiving party, security guarantee measures and security risks, and obtain your consent.
label: Data Retention
Important
Data Security
rewrite: If you need to transmit and store information cross -border, we will inform you of the relevant situation of the information outbound and obtain your consent.

text: 2.2 Method and period of information storage
We will store your information in a safe way.
label: Data Retention

text: Under normal circumstances, we will only store your personal information within the time limit for service purposes or the time limit stipulated by laws and regulations.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: Generally, your personal information is retained within the time limit required to achieve service purposes, unless the law has other requirements.

text: For example:

Mobile phone number: If you need to use QQ service, we need to keep your mobile phone number to ensure that you use the service normally. When you cancel the QQ account, we will delete the corresponding information.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: If you need to use QQ service, we need to keep your mobile phone number until you cancel the QQ account.

text: Pictures or videos: When you use space, friends, micro vision and other functions to post pictures and videos, we need to save your above information and related comments to ensure your normal use;
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: When you post pictures and videos, we need to save your above information and related comments.

text: When you actively delete the above information, we will delete the corresponding information.
label: Data Retention
Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: When you actively delete the content you posted, we will delete the corresponding information.

text: When our products or services stop operation, we will notify you in the form of push notifications and announcements, and delete your personal information or perform anonymous processing within a reasonable period.
label: Important
Cessation of Operations
rewrite: When stopping operation, we will make an announcement notice and delete or processes your personal information.

text: 3. Information security
3.1 Safety protection measures
We strive to provide protection for users' information security to prevent information leakage, loss, improper use, unauthorized access and disclosure.
label: Data Security

text: We use multi -directional security protection measures to ensure that user personal information protection is at a reasonable level of security, including technological protection methods, management system control, and security system guarantee.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Personal information security is protected through many measures such as surgical protection methods, management system control, and security system guarantee.

text: In addition, we have passed the evaluation and filing of the national network security level protection (level 3).
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The system is evaluated and filing through national network security level protection (level 3).

text: We use industry -leading technical protection measures.
label: Data Security

text: The technical means we use include but not limited to firewalls, encryption (such as SSL), de -identification or anonymous treatment, access control measures, etc.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Use firewalls, encryption, de -identification or anonymous processing, access control measures to protect your information.

text: In addition, we will continue to strengthen the security capabilities of software installed on your device.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Continuously strengthen the security capabilities of software installed on the device side.

text: For example, we will complete some information encryption work locally to consolidate security transmission;
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Complete some information encryption work locally.

text: We will understand the application information and running process information installed by your device to prevent malicious programs such as viruses and Trojans.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Understand the application information and running process information installed by your device to prevent malicious procedures.

text: We have established a special management system, process and organization that guarantees personal information security.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Establish a special management system, processes and organizations that ensure personal information security.

text: For example, we strictly restrict the scope of the personnel of the access information, require them to abide by the confidentiality obligations and audit, and those who violate the obligations will be punished in accordance with regulations.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Strictly restrict the scope of the personnel who access information, and sign a confidentiality agreement with them to punish those who violate the obligations of confidentiality.

text: We will also review the management system, process and organization to prevent unauthorized personnel from accessing, using or disclosing users' information.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: The management system, process, and organizations are reviewed to prevent information about unauthorized access, use or disclosure of users.

text: 3.2 Safety event disposal measures
If personal information leakage, damage, loss and other security incidents occur, we will start emergency plans to prevent the expansion of security events.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: We will start emergency plans to deal with information security incidents.

text: After the safety event occurs, we will timely inform you the basic situation of the security incident in the form of push notifications and emails, the disposal measures and remedial measures we are about to adopt or we have taken, and our proposal to your response.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If a personal information security incident occurs, we will inform your basic situation, possible impact, disposal measures, independent prevention suggestions, etc.

text: If it is difficult to achieve one by one, we will issue warnings through announcement and other methods.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: If it is difficult to achieve one by one, we will issue warnings through announcement and other methods.

text: 4. How do we use information

We strictly abide by the provisions of laws and regulations and the agreement with users, and in accordance with the information used in accordance with the guidelines of this privacy protection, to provide you with better services.
label: Usage

text: 4.1 Information use rules
We will use the collected information according to the following rules:
label: Usage

text: 1), we will provide you with various functions and services based on the collected information, including adding friends, sending messages, QQ sports, space and other functions;
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Provide you with various functions and services based on the collected information.

text: 2) In order to ensure the security of the account, we will use your geographical location information for security testing to provide you with a safer account registration service;
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Use your geographical information for security testing to provide more secure account registration services.

text: 3), we may use the information collected by some functions for our other services.
label: Important
Risk
Usage
rewrite: The information collected by certain functions may be used for other services.

text: For example, we may use the information we collected when we use our function or service to provide you with specific content in another function or service, including but not limited to display advertising (you can in "QQ and third parties"Sharing Information List" and "Settings-Privacy-Personal Information Protection Settings-Advertising Recommendation Settings" interface page to learn more), according to your search records, reading records, watching history and reviews, etc.Information security category tips, indirect portrait portraits based on characteristic labels and provide more accurate and personalized services and content (you can close recommendation in "Settings-Privacy-Personal Information Protection Settings-Personalized Recommendation Settings", etc.), etc.), etc.), etc.), etc.);
label: Edit/Control
Risk
Usage
Important
rewrite: We may use the information we collected when we use one function or service, and use it to provide you with specific content in another function or service.

text: 4), we will analyze the operation of our products based on the frequency, fault information, performance information of your QQ, to ensure the security of the service and optimize our products, and improve our service quality.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: Collect the frequency, fault information, and performance information of your use of QQ to analyze the operation of the product, ensure the safety of service, and improve the quality of service.

text: We will not combine the information we store in the analysis software with the personal identity information you provide.
label: Important
Usage
rewrite: The information stored in the analysis software will not be combined with your personal identity information.

text: 4.2 The way to obtain consent after notifying the purpose of the change
We will use the collected information in the purpose covered by the guidance of privacy protection.
label: Usage

text: If we use your personal information, which exceeds the purpose and scope of direct or reasonable correlation with the purpose of the time of collection, we will tell you and obtain your explicit consent again before using your personal information.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: If you use your personal information and use your personal information and have a direct or reasonable scope of the purpose of the collection, we will inform and obtain your explicit consent in advance.

text: 5. Personal information sharing, transfer and public disclosure
5.1 Personal information sharing

Except for this guideline, we will not take the initiative to share or transfer your personal information to a third party outside Tencent, such as other sharing or transfer your personal information or you need us to share or transfer your personal information toIn the third party situation outside Tencent, we will directly or confirm that the third party obtains your consent of the above behavior.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: We will not take the initiative to share or transfer your personal information to the third party outside Tencent, except for this guidance.

text: 1) Third -party service
To achieve specific functions, some services in QQ are provided by our affiliates or other third parties.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: Some services in QQ are provided by related parties or other third parties.

text: We will carefully choose third -party and third -party services, urge relevant third parties to collect and use your personal information in accordance with this guideline or the agreement reached with you, and adopt appropriate security technology and management measures to ensure your personal information security.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
First Party Collection Information
Data Security
Usage
rewrite: We will prudently choose third -party and third -party services, urge third parties to collect and use personal information in accordance with this guideline or the agreement you reached, and take measures to ensure personal information security.

text: For the specific situation of third -party information sharing, please refer to the "List of QQ and Third -Party Sharing Information" (including "Third -Party SDK Catalog").
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: For the specific situation of third -party information sharing, please refer to the "List of QQ and Third -Party Sharing Information" (including "Third -Party SDK Catalog").

text: 2) Advertising

In order to improve your user experience and optimize the advertising effect displayed in the product, we may need to share information that has been anonymous or de -identified from third -party partners, etc., and requires them to strictly abide by our measures and measures and measures on data privacy protection.Requirements, including but not limited to the processing of data protection agreements, commitments and related data processing policies to avoid identifying personal identity and ensuring privacy and security.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Data Security
Usage
rewrite: Share information from third -party partners who have been anonymous or de -identified, and require them to comply with our measures and requirements on data privacy protection to improve user experience and optimize product advertising effects.

text: For specific situations, please refer to the "Sharing Information List of QQ and Third Party".
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure

text: 5.2 Personal information disclosure

We will not publicly disclose the personal information collected to the outside world. If we must disclose it publicly, we will tell you the purpose of the public disclosure, the type of disclosure information, and the possible sensitive information involved, and obtain your explicit consent.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: If you must disclose your information publicly, we will tell you the specific situation of the public and obtain your explicit consent.

text: 5.3 Personal information transfer
Without your authorization, we will not transfer your personal information to a third party.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: Without your authorization, we will not transfer your personal information to a third party.

text: With the continuous development of our business, we may conduct merging, acquisition, asset transfer and other transactions. We will inform you that the relevant situation will continue to protect or request new controller to continue in accordance with laws and regulations and not lower than the standards required by this guideline.Protect your personal information.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: If business mergers, acquisitions, asset transfer and other transactions will be informed of the relevant situation, and it will continue to protect your personal information in accordance with laws and regulations and not lower than the standards required by this guideline.

text: 5.4, in addition, in accordance with relevant laws and regulations and national standards, in the following situations, we may share, transfer, and openly disclose personal information.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: According to relevant laws and regulations and national standards, in the following circumstances, we may share, transfer, and openly disclose personal information without obtaining the authorization consent of the subject of personal information in advance:

text: 1) In order to establish and fulfill your personal contract as a party, or to implement human resource management in accordance with the labor rules and regulations and collective contracts signed in accordance with the law in accordance with the law;
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: In order to establish and fulfill your personal contract as a party, or to implement the sharing, transfer or disclosure necessary for human resource management in accordance with the labor rules and regulations and collective contracts signed in accordance with the law and the collective contracts signed in accordance with the law, no authorization is required.

text: 2) To fulfill the statutory duties or the requirements of the statutory volunteer;
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: In order to fulfill the shared, transferred or disclosed by the statutory duties or the necessary sharing, transfer, or disclosure necessary for the statutory duty, no authorization is required.

text: 3) In order to deal with emergencies, or in urgent situations, it is necessary to protect the health and property safety of natural people;
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: In order to cope with emergencies, or in urgent situations to protect the health of natural people and the must -sharing, transfer or disclosure of property security, no authorization is required.

text: 4) In order to implement news reports and public opinion supervision, handle personal information within a reasonable scope;
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: In order to implement news reports and supervision of public opinion, deal with personal information within a reasonable scope without authorization.

text: 5) In accordance with the "Personal Information Protection Law of the People's Republic of China", deal with personal information that individuals are disclosed or other legally disclosed within a reasonable scope;
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: In accordance with laws and regulations, it is not necessary to solicit individual information in accordance with laws and regulations or other legitimate personal information that has been legally disclosed.

text: 6) Other circumstances stipulated in laws and administrative regulations.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: The sharing, transfer or disclosure of other laws and regulations and other regulations does not need to be authorized.

text: 6. Your rights

You can check the product collection and use rules at any time on the "Settings-Privacy" interface, including but not limited to this guideline and the "Sharing Information List of QQ and Third Party", as well as the product sensitive authority use rules and authorization.

text: 7. Change
label: Policy Change

text: We may revise this guidelines in a timely manner.
label: Policy Change

Important

label: Policy Change
Important

text: 8. Minor protection
We attach great importance to the protection of personal information of minors.
label: Specific Audiences

text: According to the relevant laws and regulations, if you are a minor under the age of 18, you should obtain the written consent of your parents or legal guardians before using QQ service.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: Minors under the age of 18 should obtain the written consent of the guardian before use.

text: If you are the guardian of minors, when you have any questions about the personal information of the minors you monitor, please contact us through the contact information in Section 10.
label: Specific Audiences

text: In particular, if you are a child under the age of 14, we also set up the "Child Privacy Protection Statement" for you. Children and their guardians should carefully read Tencent's special formulation before using QQ services for children under 14 years old."Child Privacy Protection Statement".
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: Before children under the age of 14 use QQ services, children and their guardians should also read the "Child Privacy Protection Statement" specially formulated.

text: Only after obtaining the consent of the guardian's "Children's Privacy Protection Statement", children under the age of 14 can use QQ services.
label: Specific Audiences
Important
rewrite: Only after obtaining the consent of the guardian's "Children's Privacy Protection Statement", children under the age of 14 can use QQ services.

text: 9. Others

"Tencent Privacy Policy" is a general privacy clause that Tencent is uniformly applicable, and the user rights and information security guarantee measures stipulated in them are suitable for QQ users.
For example, the "Tencent Privacy Policy" is inconsistent or contradictory with this guideline, please refer to this guideline.
"Child Privacy Protection Statement" is an information protection rule for children users under 14 years of age.

text: Within the scope of the "Child Privacy Protection Statement", such as the "Tencent Privacy Policy" and this guideline are inconsistent or contradictory, please refer to the "Child Privacy Protection Statement".
